meanings.definition: Bejabers (interjection): used to express surprise or emphasis
meanings.sent2: Oh bejabers, I forgot my umbrella at home.
meanings.sent3: Bejabers! I can't believe you ate the whole pizza by yourself.
meanings.sent4: When the magician pulled the rabbit out of the hat, the audience exclaimed, 'Bejabers!'
meanings.sent5: The thunderstorm was so loud, it made everyone shout 'Bejabers!'

meanings.sent1: My grandma always says 'bejabers' when she's surprised.
meanings.sent2: The child's 'bejabers' could be heard throughout the room.

meanings.sent4: The sudden loud noise made him shout 'bejabers!'
meanings.sent5: The clown's antics elicited a chorus of 'bejabers' from the audience.
